channel.title: Speed Testing on 0x000216

item.title: Beogram 4002 Type 5513: Results of Initial Platter Motor Test
item.description:
I ran the Beogram for slightly more than a day and then analyzed the logged measurement data. As shown in the graph, which plots RPM over time, the turntable speed remained relatively stable at the target 33 1/3 RPM, but there were noticeable drops, reaching as low as 30.324 RPM after about three and a half hours. This result aligns with Beolover’s initial findings when testing similar motors. Based on other Beogram DC motor tests conducted by Beolover, it will be revealing to observe the performance of this Beogram after re-lubricating the platter motor bearings...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5513-results-of-initial-platter-motor-test/
